You can play pin the blame on the donkey, but the reality is Steve Ballmer has to accept some of the blame, he said. "He also has to put the right people in the right places." Here's how David Letterman recounted his very first meeting with Michelle Obama . She was on the show, but I didn't think I would see her because the Secret Service doesn't want my kind messing around with her kind, David Letterman joked. However, the officials told David Letterman to wait for the first lady off stage and that she would speak to him after her interview with Regis Philbin and Kelly Ripa . is a "clearly written work that attempts to cut through a number of myths to give a measured account of how things happened and why". Instead of "seriously contemplating the implications" of the events in which he participated, Donald Rumsfeld "spends more than 800 pages dodging them".
